sentences.sentence: It even has a medical name: cerumen.
sentences.translation: 它甚至还有个医学名字：耵聍。

sentences.sentence: It even has a medical name: cerumen.
sentences.translation: 它甚至还有一个医学名称“耵聍”。

sentences.sentence: It even has a medical name: cerumen. And there are two kinds.
sentences.translation: 它甚至还有一个医学名字：耵聍，并且有两种类型。
